dkeep.logic

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the features activated in the game and extra variables, such as moving enemies, weapon allwance, guard personality, ogre quantity, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean attackingEnemies
      Indicates if there will be enemies attacking the hero
      boolean attackingEnemiesWeapons
      Indicates if the enemies will have weapons(ogre-club)
      boolean attackingHero
      Indicates if the hero will be able to attack(stun ogres)
      int currentLevel
      Indicates the current level
      int[][] dungeonModel
      The begging state of dungeon(complete model) of the current level
      Guard.Personality guardPersonality
      Indicates the personality of the existing guard
      boolean movingEnemies
      Indicates if there will be moving enemies in game
      int ogreQuantity
      Indicates the ogre quantity(3 by default)
      boolean running
      Indicates the game runnign state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameState(int level)
      GameState constructor Selects the beggining state of the dungeon according to game level
      GameState(int[][] dungeonModel, int difficulty)
      More specialized game constructor Lets us choose difficulty And accepts a personalized dungeon It influences difficulty by setting/unsetting attakcing enemies, weapons, and enemy movement
      GameState(int level, int ogreQuantity, int guardPersonalityIndex)
      More specialized game constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState(int level)
        GameState constructor Selects the beggining state of the dungeon according to game level
        Parameters:
        level - game level

      • GameState

        public GameState(int[][] dungeonModel,
                 int difficulty)
        More specialized game constructor Lets us choose difficulty And accepts a personalized dungeon It influences difficulty by setting/unsetting attakcing enemies, weapons, and enemy movement
        Parameters:
        dungeonModel - personalized dungeon wich will be selected to the game
        difficulty - difficuly of the dungeon(0 or 1)

        Parameters:
        level - game level
        ogreQuantity - ogre quantity
        guardPersonalityIndex - guard personality
